title-group.article-title: Financing Decisions: Lessons from the Spanish Experience

abstract.p: This paper studies the financing decisions of Spanish firms. The results presented in the paper provide empirical evidence that Spanish firms care about whether the funds are raised publicly or privately as well as about whether the new funds are in the form of debt or equity. This evidence confirms the results obtained by Mackie-Mason (1990a) for American firms.
